runs.comm: round the wicket, tossed up on leg stump and nudged through square for a single
floated up and in the slot, Lumb drills this along the ground through cover for the first boundary
fuller and a touch wide of the stumps, Lumb allows it through to the keeper
gets on the front foot and dabs one into the covers
flat, pushed across the right-hander from round the wicket, Hales sits back and slashes behind point for four more
floated up on leg stump, Hales taps short to the on side
pitched up slightly wide and thrashed through point, in the air for a bit but in front of the diving fielder, four more
good pace, little bit of extra lift of a length, beats the bat as Lumb flirts outside off

full, toe-ended on the drive straight to mid-off! It's only taken Australia nine balls to get a wicket, a couple of boundaries for Lumb but then he falls trying to crunch the ball over the infield, lollipopped it to the catcher, Lynn
swings across the line, down the leg side and it squirts off the pad
dug in short, Hales sees it big and swivel-pulls fiercely through backward square, wide open space and it races to the rope
fullish, in the corridor outside off and flashed through backward point this time, quicksilver hands from Hales
good length and this jags back off the pitch, hits Wright on the knee roll but the appeal is declined
slings this down the leg side as Wright shuffles across - wide
touch short, outside the line of off, tapped towards point
back of a length, Wright doesn't really get near it but there's enough on a thickish top edge to send the ball over the leap of slip and away for another boundary
bit of width, Wright stays back and steers a cut to backward point
dug in short and at the batsman, he swats cross-batted at it, cloths the ball in the air short of mid-on
length ball in the channel outside off, opens the face and slices one down to third man
hit on the pad, again seaming in but height an issue, Coulter-Nile is a tall man and gets considerable bounce... There's nearly a mix-up as the ball squirts into the off side but they get a leg bye
gets on the front foot and blocks a length ball to extra cover
not all that short but punched wristily through midwicket, little pirouette and a lot of bottom hand
pitched up outside off, driven in front of square
fullish, again in the channel, this time Hales larrups a lofted cover drive over the ring - four more, Hales is cruising
good line from Coulter-Nile, nibbles back but a thin inside edge saves the batsman from a plumb lbw shout
length ball, takes a bit of bat and hits the pad before looping into the leg side - no one there though!
slightly short and raked through square leg, muscular pull shot from Wright
gottim, the drag-on slays Wright! Slower ball from Henriques, Wright again tried to heave to leg, the ball came off the toe end of the bat and shattered the wicket
fullish, pushed back to the bowler coming forward
goes across and works a single through square on the leg side

pinned in front, Henriques has two in the over! Hales has walked across his stumps, tried to dab a fullish ball to leg and simply missed, struck right in front of middle and off, Henriques had to appeal long and hard but deserved the result
full of a length, outside off, poked back to the bowler
plays to leg, gets a leading edge
drops back and cuts into the ground towards point, again can't get it through
skips out and swings the arms, a billowing top edge sails down towards third man but short of the fielder
good line and length from Hazlewood, fired across the bows, Morgan watches it by
another dot ball, keeping Morgan honest in the channel outside off
tossed up, outside off, pushed down the ground to long-off
tossed up and smeared over cover, flowing swing of the bat from Morgan and the ball skids to the fence well in front of the off-side sweeper

swings to leg, misses - bowled him! The "Big Show" strikes and he's taken out England's matchwinner. Morgan was aiming to cart this over deep midwicket, the ball skipped on off the surface, no turn and rattled straight into the stumps
slides this down the leg side, tucked of the pads
tossed up, around leg stump, pushed back past the bowler for one to long-on
tossed up on the stumps, Buttler works the ball through square, wide of the sweeper and they get two
floated up outside off, driven on the up through the covers
slightly short, Buttler stays back but can't beat cover with a punch
full and inviting and Buttler bites, tears off a huge chunk as a slog-sweep disappears into the stands at deep midwicket - England's first six
slides this on towards leg stumps, worked through backward square
tossed up in the channel, nicely timed drive and it's into the gap between deep cover and long-off for a couple
on the stumps, forces the ball through the covers to the sweeper
pushed across from over the wicket, Root nurdles one into the off side
back away and bunts four down the ground, powerful swing from Buttler's Popeye forearms and it only bounces once
quicker and flatter, opens the face and runs one to short third man, Root gets home with a dive
can't work this into a gap to leg
full toss, Root latches on to it and clumps four out towards wide long-on
tossed up, comes forward and pushes one more to long-off - decent over for England
drops short, nailed over deep square leg for a flat six! Lovely timing on the hook from Root, who doesn't usually look capable of such power
another boundary, chipped over mid-off, leaned into the drive and picks up four
steers a short ball in front of point
Buttler steps away and bullies a full ball flat and wide of long-off, they get back for two
good response from Henriques, slower ball outside off, Buttler fiddles and misses
pitched up, chopped back down the ground for one more to long-off
off the pad into the leg side, Buttler starts to run, no where near a single on and Wade almost runs him out
step to leg, follow him, clubbed off a thick inside edge to long-on
length on leg stump, nudged to midwicket
slower ball again, swung to leg and it lands well short of deep-midwicket
full at the stumps, driven firmly at the bowler who fumbles and they get a single to long-off
low full toss, swung over midwicket, only just over midwicket reaching up and it runs away for four

full on off stump, swung into the off side and picks out deep cover it was a juicy ball to hit but Buttler got it too square and not off the middle of the bat, comfortable catch for the man coming a few yards in off the rope
length outside off, gets it off the toe back to the bowler
full outside off and Root carves it to deep cover, the return throw cannons the stumps and they get a buzzard
half-volley just outside off and swings it straight to long-off for the second time in the over a ball that could well of gone out of the park finds the fielder, a simple miscue
full on the off stump and Bopara plays the perfect straight drive, unfortunately long-off is back so it's just a single
length outside off, chopped on the bounce to point
short and pulled out to deep-square leg
dragged down and cut out to deep cover
floated up onto leg stump, dropped into midwicket and they race for two but can't get back
full length and tucked out to long-on
touch short and blasted out to deep cover
down leg side, swept and missed
floated up on the stumps and clipped out to long-on
back of a length and slapped out to long-on
length ball on off stump and whacked into the bank over midwicket
full length on off stump, driven to extra-cover
full on off stump and Bopara clears the midwicket fence again, bigger strike this one
full again but further outside off, Bopara plays a lavish off drive on the bounce to long-off
good yorker, dug out into the covers
floated up on the stumps, driven down to long-off
flat delivery outside off, forced off the back foot where point saves well diving to his right
leg stump line, slapped off a thick inside edge back to the bowler
big swing and a miss to a ball spinning away from off stump, appeal for a stumping and we'll have a check on this but Bresnan is back in time
forced off the back foot out to deep cover
floated up on leg stump and worked through square leg, hard running brings two
full just outside off, mistimed drive to long-off
low full toss and Bopara flicks it over long-on, marvellous timing
full outside off and Bopara swings it over long-on again, full flourish of the bat and it's into the terraces again
better length outside off and Bopara can only slap it down to long-off
good yorker again and it's just a single to long-off
full outside off again, carved out to deep cover
full toss and Bopara can only mistime it to deep midwicket, that should have gone to Sydney
another full toss, this is bunted down the ground and they get two running hard taking on long-on
steps to leg, swings hard, misses and Bresnan is clean bowled by a little bit of spin but mostly a wild swipe from not the best base
swept first ball over square leg, lovely strike over the short boundary
back and goes to pull, gets a toe end to long-on
low full toss on off stump, clipped down to long-on
yorker just outside off, dug out down to long-on
decent bumper, Broad tries to stay inside it and uppercut but misses
another short ball, this time Broad steps inside it and pulls hard over square leg into the building site
full toss on leg stump, Broad misses trying to poke it into the off side and it gets a tiny flick on leg stump which is enough to remove the bails. That literally touched the varnish
length ball outside off, Dernbach aims a huge swing at it and misses
full on off stump, carved out to deep cover but they refuse the run to keep Bopara on strike
back of a length, heaved into the leg side, comes off high on the bat and rolls to deep-square leg for just a single
full on leg stump and Dernbach slogs it down the ground, straight as a dye and gets four, good stroke actually
back of a length, carved out towards deep-cover, Lynn flies forward at it and almost pulls off a blinding catch
punchy drive through extra cover, lovely stroke, excellent timing
back of a length and swung into the leg side gap in front of square, four more

full at the stumps, flicks it to short long leg, they race a single, Dernbach dives in but is short of his ground sharp work from Finch in the circle and Wade made no mistake in whipping the bails off
five wides to start, England still in the game!!
not anymore, standing outside off, aimed a swing at a ball outside off but only finds the bowler having mistimed it
low full toss and Bopara plays a delightful lofted drive over long-off and Bopara now has the fastest T20 fifty for England
another low full toss, swung to leg but this isn't quite timed and they refuse any runs towards cow corner
full on the stumps and swung backward of square and over the rope, another superb strike
length outside off, Bopara slogs it with one hand and manages to clear the boundary again! What an innings this is!
around the wicket, forced from off stump to deep-midwicket
